tool_description: This API will help to determine the sense means positivity toxicity and how much toxic it is!😊
name: comment-analyzer
title: comment-analyzer

api_list.name: analyze comment
api_list.description: Analyze any comment in sort of some sense **pretty accurately.**
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://comment-analyzer.p.rapidapi.com/analyze"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "comment-analyzer.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://comment-analyzer.p.rapidapi.com/analyze"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "comment-analyzer.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
